String.name: tooltipText1
String.value: Secure your Mac from all kinds of unsafe Internet data by enabling Firewall settings. Keep your Mac healthy and all the apps on it up-to-date!

String.name: tooltipText2
String.value: Get rid of junk files which have pilled up on your Mac. Free up valuable space and use it for new better apps. Clean your Mac from junk safely!

String.name: tooltipText3
String.value: Improve your Mac performance by removing unused old and large data. Speed up your Mac by updating the apps you use to the latest version - all at once!

String.name: securityTooltipTextGood
String.value: All the security settings of your Mac are activated. Your System is secured.

String.name: securityTooltipTextMedium
String.value: Some security settings are inactive. It is highly recommended to fix all issues immediately.

String.name: securityTooltipTextCritical
String.value: We detected that your security settings are off. Prevent your Mac from malware or spyware attacks by fixing all issues now.

String.name: cleaningTooltipTextGood
String.value: Your Mac contains no junk files. The system is clean and organized. Nothing to worry about!

String.name: cleaningTooltipTextMedium
String.value: There are too many junk files on your System. They clutter up your Mac and occupy valuable space on hard drive.

String.name: cleaningTooltipTextCritical
String.value: Your Mac is shockingly dirty. We recommend fixing all the issues detected during scan immediately.

String.name: performanceTooltipTextGood
String.value: Your Mac performance is excellent. No problems have been detected during scan.

String.name: performanceTooltipTextMedium
String.value: Your Mac performance is medium. There are some issues decreasing the speed of your Mac.

String.name: performanceTooltipTextCritical
String.value: Unfortunately your system performs slower than it should. To boost your Mac performance at once we advise to fix all the issues associated.

String.name: totalTooltipTextGood
String.value: Your System in a Good state. Although we recommend improving your system condition by repairing the issues found during the recent scan.

String.name: totalTooltipTextMedium
String.value: Your System is in a Risky state. Please fix the System issues detected on your Mac to make it work smoothly.

String.name: totalTooltipTextCritical
String.value: Your System is in a Critical state. We take your System health seriously, and thus recommend fixing all the issues detected immediately.

String.name: firstDetailsHeader
String.value: Please turn on Security right now, then remember the instructions and follow if you lose your Mac.

String.name: firstDetailsItemHead1

String.name: macShinyMakesInternet
String.value: MacShiny makes the Internet a safer place by blocking all threats and vulnerabilities automatically.

String.name: theInternetIsFull
String.value: The Internet is full of threats, such as identity theft, credit card fraud, Trojan horses, malware, and phishing.

String.name: useToScan
String.value: Use to scan your volumes and connected flash drives for viruses. Or use real-time antivirus protection to be safe every minute.

String.name: antivirusDatabaseUpdates
String.value: Antivirus database updates are granted for the first 12 months from the date of MacShiny Antivirus installation and should be renewed every next 12 months.

String.name: virusDatabase
